$WmMPID_ハロサクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_halloween17,Face|Um... Are you OK, little girl? Are you
looking for your mommy and daddy?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロノノ,ch04_13_Nono_F_halloween17,Face|Are you kidding? I'm not some lost
little kid! I'm a witch!$k$pI've been casting magic longer than
you've been around, I'll have you
know!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロサクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_halloween17,Face|I'm s-sorry! I didn't realize...$k$pCan I make it up to you by giving you
some c-candy? It's delicious...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロノノ,ch04_13_Nono_F_halloween17,Face|Did you say "candy"? Of course!
Thanks!$k$pOh, look! Some people are coming. I
bet they have candy, too!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロサクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_halloween17,Face|W-we can try asking. Pardon me, but
do you have any candy to share?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロノノ,ch04_13_Nono_F_halloween17,Face|No, no, no! Don't you know how it
goes?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロサクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_halloween17,Face|Oh, of course...$k$pTrick or treat! Give me something
good to eat...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロノノ,ch04_13_Nono_F_halloween17,Face|I'll play a trick on you if you don't!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ハロサクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_halloween17,Face|Aww... Take it e-easy on me! If you're
not nice, I'll come back and haunt
you!$k$pWe'd better retreat for now... Follow
me if you want some more candy!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロノノ,ch04_13_Nono_F_halloween17,Face|Yay!$k$p$Sbs150|
